sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'module' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, Button, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { createOrder, getOrderDetails } from '../actions/orderActions' const OrderScreen = ({ match }) => { const orderId = match.params.id const dispatch = useDispatch() const orderDetails = useSelector(state => state.orderDetails) const { order, loading, error } = orderDetails if (!loading) { // Calculate prices const addDecimals = (num) => { return (Math.round(num * 100) / 100).toFixed(2) } order.itemsPrice = addDecimals(order.orderItems.reduce( (acc, item) => Number((acc + item.price * item.qty).toFixed(2)), 0)) } useEffect(() => { dispatch(getOrderDetails(orderId)) }, [dispatch, orderId]) return loading ? : error ? {error} : <>

Order {order._id}

Shipping

Name : {order.user.name}

Email : {order.user.email}

Address : {order.shippingAddress.address},{' '} {order.shippingAddress.city},{' '} {order.shippingAddress.country},{' '} {order.shippingAddress.postalCode}

{ order.isDelivered ? Paid on {order.deliveredAt} : Not Delivered }

Payment Method

Method: {' '} {order.paymentMethod}

{ order.isPaid ? Paid on {order.paidAt} : Not Paid }

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? Your order is empty : ( {order.orderItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items ${order.itemsPrice} Shipping ${order.shippingPrice} Tax ${order.taxPrice} Total ${order.totalPrice} } export default OrderScreen
